hero_description: Accept ARS payments to CVU and cards. Fast, secure, no hidden fees. Solutions for businesses and freelancers.
block_1_text_1: Accept Visa, MasterCard, and all major Argentine cards. Instant ARS crediting to your CVU or card. Transparent rates, no hidden fees.
block_1_text_2: Our team of experts is always available to help with integration and payment questions.
block_1_text_3: Integrate once — get access to all payment tools. Scale your business without limits.
block_1_text_4: Your funds and data are protected by encryption, 3D Secure, and 2FA. Full compliance with Argentine standards.
block_2_title_1: P2P Transfers to CVU and Cards
block_2_text_1: Instant ARS receipt from any Argentine bank. Your clients pay to CVU or card, and you get notifications and transparent reporting.
block_2_visual_prompt_1: A modern, minimalistic illustration showing two payment cards (one labeled CVU, one as a classic bank card) with a dynamic arrow between them, symbolizing instant transfer. The background is transparent black with a semi-transparent ruby red (#C1001F) overlay, creating a vibrant but soft effect. Add subtle white and black accents for contrast. The style should feel high-tech and trustworthy, with clean lines and a sense of speed and transparency.
block_2_text_2: Accept online payments for your store or platform. Support for subscriptions, refunds, and chargeback management.
block_2_visual_prompt_2: A sleek, high-tech illustration of an online store interface with a prominent 'Pay' button, a shopping cart, and digital payment icons (Visa, Mastercard, QR code). The background is transparent black with a semi-transparent ruby red (#C1001F) overlay. Add subtle white highlights and black details for depth. The style should convey security, modern e-commerce, and seamless digital transactions.
block_2_visual_prompt_3: A clean, modern illustration of an e-commerce checkout page with a large 'Pay' button, shopping cart, and digital payment icons (Visa, Mastercard, QR code). The background is pure white with ruby red (#C1001F) accents and soft gray shadows. Use black for text and interface outlines. The style should feel open, trustworthy, and easy to use, emphasizing clarity and seamless payment experience.
block_3_description: Growth solutions — from startups to large companies.
block_3_text_3: Pay only for completed client payments.
block_3_text_4: Personal manager and 24/7 support always in touch.
block_4_text_1: The client initiates a payment and transfers ARS to your CVU or card. The system instantly records the receipt of funds.
block_4_text_2: After the funds are received, we perform verification, comply with all requirements, and prepare the payout. Everything is automated.
block_4_text_3: Net funds are credited to your account. You receive notifications and can track all transactions in real time.
block_4_text_4: Our technical support monitors all transactions 24/7 for your security.
block_5_description: Leave a request or write to us on Telegram — we will respond within 5 minutes.
block_5_description_2: Contact us in Telegram and get a quick answer from our team. What payment solution are you looking for?
